{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$4.2M in 2021-2022** on contracts with 3469051 CANADA.

Across 74 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 14 have at least one amendment (19%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 103% and the average number of amendments was 1.29. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$4.8M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.78 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$203.8K. The longest contract was 3.2 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$3.6M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [3469051 Canada Inc.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%223469051%20Canada%20Inc.%22)
- [3469051 CANADA INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%223469051%20CANADA%20INC.%22)
{{< /details >}}
